gen:ReportedAttribute.com:Text: Objective 13. Take urgent action to combat climate change and its repercussions2
13.2 Incorporate climate change measures into national policies, strategies and planning
13.2.1 Number of national communications prepared on the implementation of the policy aimed at improving climate change
Ministry of the Environment, Agriculture and Livestock
MBAZUMUTIMANA Dieudonne
Statistical service
SDG focal point within the Ministry
dembaze@yahoo.fr
This is the number of national communications prepared on the implementation of the policy aimed at improving climate change
Number
Annual report on the achievements of the OBPE
Administrative data
Annual
Annual
MINEAGRIE
MINEAGRIE
The Ministerial departments are the members of the SSN whose mission is to collect, process and disseminate the data of their sector.
The indicator is relevant because it reflects the state of environmental protection
The exhaustiveness of this indicator depends on the regular reporting of the activities carried out in this area.
Count of national communications prepared on the implementation of the policy aimed at improving climate change
This indicator is validated internally only
The indicator is available at national level
The indicator can be compared to other indicators of the same type at regional and international level
National Communication 2011
